name: Collectamon
description:
WORD FROM THE DEVELOPER

When the idea for this game came to mind I really wanted to have a grindy game I could sink my teeth into while listening to a podcast or even watching a video. With this game I tried to accomplish just that.

RELAX AND CATCH SOME MONSTERS

Sit back, relax and grab yourself a drink because Collectamon is meant to be a relaxing experience.
Put on your favorite podcast or even a good video while playing. You won't be punished for anything the point of the game is just to relax and catch some monsters.

UPGRADES

The game has a lot of upgrades for you to obtain while playing. Catch monsters to earn collectacoins and upgrade your character to catch monsters faster and more efficient. You can even upgrade the area to make more monsters spawn!

SANCTUARY

Place your caught monsters in your sanctuary to have them generate currency which you can spend on more upgrades!
Future updates will bring more customization to the Sanctuary as well allowing you to decorate it to your heart's content.

SUPER RARE

If you are very lucky you might find rare shiny Collectamon...
